QuestData.Title: But... I Am the Hero of Ducks
QuestData.Description:
Hold on... there is something...
<Gracus looks around.>
Firequackers! The boy must have gone down the river again! No matter how often I tell him, he always tries to play with the hornswogs!
I need you to go check on him. I hope he didn't get swallowed again.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Firequackers and make sure he gets to Gracus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Gracus about what you saw.
QuestData.RewardText:
He was swallowed by the--
Firequackers still has much to learn.
Pilot on the other hand has already taken a liking to you. The smartest of the brood and the one most ready to leave.
For all that you have done, I thank you! Take care of my sweet duckling!

Objectives.Objective: Make the Queasy Hornswog throw up
